titleInfo.title: Nashville: the Other Side of the Alley

mods.abstract: Two color window card (brown and blue on white) announcing Nashville: the Other Side of the Alley's Insurgent Country Volume 3 featuring Tom House, Tim Caroll, Phil Lee, Paul Burch, R. B. Morris, Hayseed, Sonny George, Jason and the Scorchesrs, Duane Jarvis, Lambchop, Royann Calvin, Dan Baird, Greg Garing, Kristi Rose, Gwil Owen, Lonesome Bob, Courtesy Move. Poster features a metal photoplate of men.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
